name: Longing For The Sun
description:
Game made for the My First Game Jam Summer 2021 Game Jam.

Retro style first person shooter set in a dungeon where your goal is to climb the levels to freedom.

Controls: WASD move character.

Move: Controls camera/Aims gun.

Shoot: Left mouse botton.

Credits

Music: JDB Artist - Madness Electronic Music Pack

Monster and Effect Art: Toomask - GameDevMarket - Pixel Characters Collection Vol 1

Sound Effects: Imphenzia - Universal Sound FX
